name: Another Point Of View
description:
Is it a 2d game?

Is it a 3d game?

Is it a platformer?

Is it a puzzle?

Yes! APOV is a 2D and 3D puzzle platformer!

Your goal is to reach the final platform as soon as possible, but sometimes there are vertical platforms crossing your way. Change the point of view and interact with the buttons while having the same color on your player.

The current world record is 40 seconds!

Tutorial

A / D: Move Player

Space: Jump

Tab: Change POV

LMB: Interact

H: Hide Tutorial

R: Restart

ESC / P: Pause

APOV is my entry for the Mix and Game Jam 2020. The theme was MIXING GENRES.

This was my first game jam and everything was created within 48 hours.
